name: Stress planting
description:
This is cute endless survival farming platformer game with an otter as a main character!

This game is giving you limited space to jump. It's defined by a breathable atmosphere, which you have to extend by planting flowers. The ocean level is also rising, so better hurry up with catching the seeds! 

Controls

  • move - a,d
  • jump - w or space
  • plant - i
  • water -u

The score is counted by how much the sky limit is lifted in a run.

Credits

  • Programming: Villfuk02
  • Graphic design: LucieTvar
  • Music composition: SharpFoxDev
  • SFX: Zapsplat.com, Kenny.nl, freesound.org
